LinesAnswers.name: victory
LinesAnswers.line: SIMON: 'These place is free now, maybe I'll sleep here.

LinesAnswers.name: defeat
LinesAnswers.line: BABUSHKA: Oh, it's you again?! It's suspecious, what do you need from me? I'll call stewardess now!

responses.response: Oops, I haven't thought about it.

LinesAnswers.name: warn
LinesAnswers.line: BABUSHKA: Ah, you say that is your place? I don't understand.  Do you have a ticket? ..Wind blows from somewhere, I can't sleep like that.

LinesAnswers.name: helpReminder
LinesAnswers.line: BABUSHKA: Oh, this bag is so big, I can't put it under the bed myself.
